page.title: 06Aberford Parish Council
page.content: The council often deals with problems and complaints.It also makes sure that the grass and roads are in good condition. It also helps by lending money to village organizations. It meets on the 3rd. Tuesday of each month except in August and an annual meeting is held in May.There are 7 councillors and 2/3 must be present for a meeting.A term of office is 4 years.Council meets in school or in the village hall during school holidays.{Councillors}:-Chairman-Mr.J. P.Bouvet,Vice-chairman-Mr.P.Walton. Members-Mrs.S.Fawcett,Mr.J.H.Thompson, Mr.D.Howson,Mr.D.Stainton and Mr.F.H.Watson.Mr.K.Lightfoot is clerk to the council.In 1985/86 the council has a total of Â£720 to spend and the most common complaint is of vandalism. An important event is the Lord Mayors annual lunch with the councillors.
